message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. We kindly invite you to consider purchasing this item at a special introductory price of $7500. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to your consideration.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the introductory price, I'm looking to spend closer to $10000 on this product.  Would you be willing to consider that price?

Thank you for your interest, Bob. We understand your valuation of our product and appreciate your willingness to invest in it. In light of your offer, we are pleased to counter with a proposal of $9500 for the purchase of our premium product. This price reflects a balance between the value we place on the item and your expressed budget. We hope this offer aligns more closely with your expectations while still allowing us to fairly compensate for the quality and craftsmanship of our product. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this arrangement.
